decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Location Plan 2213-LSD-10500 P1, Block Plan 2213-LSD-10750 P1, Existing First Floor Plans 2213-LSD-10101 P1, Existing Second Floor Plan 2213-LSD-10102 P1, Existing Roof Plan 2213-LSD-10103 P1, Existing Long Sections 2213-LSD-10200 P1, Existing Front and Rear Elevations 2213-LSD-10300 P1, Existing Side Elevations 2213-LSD-10301 P1, Proposed First Floor Plan 2213-LSD-11101 P1, Proposed Second Floor Plan 2213-LSD-11102 P1, Proposed Long Sections 2213-LSD- 11200 P3, Proposed Front and Rear Elevation 2213-LSD- 11300 P3, Proposed Side Elevations 2213-LSD- 11301 P3, Proposed Roof Plan 2213-LSD-11103 P1
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The privacy screen (obscured glass balustrade) identified in the approved drawings listed in condition 2, shall be installed up to a minimum height of 1.70m, prior to use of the terrace and permanently retained thereafter.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
description: Raising the roof ridge of main roof, roof extension to rear (main) roof slope, part rear roof extension to rear outrigger incorporating rear terrace and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope, replacement of side and rear first floor windows.
